snippet.title: [Launch Day Special] "Heat Death: Survival Train" Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Early Access Launch day!

The wait is over! Heat Death: Survival Train Early Access launches in just a few hours.

What to Expect:
 * An Expanded World: Explore a significantly larger map, three times the size of the public demo.
 * A Customizable Arsenal: Upgrade your train with over 20 unique modules.
 * Intense Combat: Face off against formidable enemies.
 * Endless Possibilities: Immerse yourself in a thrilling, open-world adventure.

Expect around 9 hours of gameplay on average, but your journey can last upto 10s of hours depending how robust you want your train and how much you discover of the world. Some professional players may beat the game a bit faster by just completing the essential tasks.

Join Us for the Launch Stream!
Be among the first to experience Early Access with us! Tune in to our special launch stream on:
YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7g1c-pOj1cc
Twitch:
https://www.twitch.tv/easy_ngp
Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2662780/Heat_Death_Survival_Train/

Watch an official walkthrough, ask questions, and join the community.

Launch Trailer
Learn more about the game before the launch with our brand-new trailer, premiering on YouTube 2 hours before Early Access release.

New public demo
Can’t wait to start your adventure? Download the new public demo now! It’s been updated with bug fixes and balance improvements.

Your journey begins now...

Heat Death is a sci-fi survival game where you can build your Train and explore a frozen world! This train is not only your base but also your vehicle and weapon!

You can play an updated demo and wishlist the game on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2662780/Heat_Death_Survival_Train/

Join our discord server to share your thoughts and comments with us and get beta versions of the game: 
https://discord.gg/WH8RCvcnUQ

All socials are here:
https://linktr.ee/heatdeathgame


#Gameplay
In this game, you will explore a vast world with different biomes and weather conditions, craft and customize your train with various compartments and attachments, survive deadly storms and hostile bots and drones, and discover the planet’s secrets. Heat Death is being developed using Unreal Engine 5 and offers stunning graphics.

#Environment
Heat Death takes place on an Eyeball planet, which is tidally locked to its star. One side of the planet always faces the star, and the other is always dark! Your goal is to travel to the dark side of this planet!

If you enjoyed this video, please give it a thumbs up, leave a comment, share it with your friends, and subscribe to our channel for more updates on Heat Death: Survival Train!
